ud2.6:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena annatarassa paribbajakassa daharamanavika pajapati hoti gabbhini upavijanna.
ud2.6:1.4: Atha kho sa paribbajika tam paribbajakam etadavoca:
ud2.6:1.5: “gaccha tvam, brahmana, telam ahara, yam me vijataya bhavissati”ti.

ud2.6:2.4: “gaccha tvam, brahmana, telam ahara, yam me vijataya bhavissati”ti.

ud2.6:3.1: Tena kho pana samayena ranno pasenadissa kosalassa kotthagare samanassa va brahmanassa va sappissa va telassa va yavadattham patum diyati, no niharitum.
ud2.6:4.2: “ranno kho pana pasenadissa kosalassa kotthagare samanassa va brahmanassa va sappissa va telassa va yavadattham patum diyati, no niharitum.
ud2.6:4.3: Yannunaham ranno pasenadissa kosalassa kotthagaram gantva telassa yavadattham pivitva gharam agantva ucchadditvana dadeyyam, yam imissa vijataya bhavissati”ti.
ud2.6:5.1: Atha kho so paribbajako ranno pasenadissa kosalassa kotthagaram gantva telassa yavadattham pivitva gharam agantva neva sakkoti uddham katum, na pana adho.
ud2.6:5.2: So dukkhahi tibbahi kharahi katukahi vedanahi phuttho avattati parivattati.
ud2.6:6.1: Atha kho bhagava pubbanhasamayam nivasetva pattacivaramadaya savatthim pindaya pavisi.
ud2.6:6.2: Addasa kho bhagava tam paribbajakam dukkhahi tibbahi kharahi katukahi vedanahi phuttham avattamanam parivattamanam.
